name: WNRS x Bumble BFF
questions:
What about my
 Bumble profile made
 you swipe right?

What do you think I was like
 in high school?

How would you describe
 your ex in three words?
 How would they describe
 you?

What type of social
 situation makes you feel
 the most awkward?

What takes someone from
 a friend to a best friend?

What have you let go of
 this year that's made the
 most positive change?

What question are you
 trying to answer in your
 life right now?

What's the nicest thing
 you can remember
 doing for a friend?
 Permission to brag.

When was the last time
 someone made you feel
 special on your birthday?

Has a quote ever changed
 your worldview?

Wild Card Think of a movie that
 always makes you cry. On
 the count of three, say
 your answers out loud.
 (Both players)

Wild Card Illustrate your
 current love life.
 30 seconds. Compare.

Wild Card Do you need advice on
 anything in your life
 right now?
 Permission to vent.
 (Both players)

Wild Card Write down the three
 most important
 qualities in a BFF.
 One minute. Compare.
 (Both players.)

What part of
 my personality wasn't
 showcased online?

What do you admire
 most about me?
